software_directories.name: G2
software_directories.action: Create profile immediately — this is where businesses compare software

software_directories.name: Capterra
software_directories.action: List ASAP — Capterra is a major discovery channel for salon software

software_directories.name: Product Hunt
software_directories.action: Plan a launch — can generate initial buzz and backlinks

software_directories.name: AppSumo
software_directories.action: Consider a lifetime deal to build initial user base quickly

startup_directories.name: AlternativeTo
startup_directories.action: List as alternative to Fresha, Booksy, Square Appointments

trade_associations.name: American Barber Association
trade_associations.relevance: high — leading source of professional recognition for barbers
trade_associations.opportunity: Sponsorship, partnership, advertising in their communications

trade_associations.name: Professional Beauty Association (PBA)
trade_associations.relevance: high — networking for salon professionals and barbers

trade_associations.name: International SalonSpa Business Network (ISBN)
trade_associations.relevance: medium — focuses on salon chains and managers
trade_associations.opportunity: Annual conference for salon chain owners

trade_publications.name: Behind the Chair
trade_publications.relevance: high — widely read by stylists and salon owners

events_and_conferences.name: Bronner Bros International Beauty Show
events_and_conferences.relevance: high — massive event for Black hair professionals

events_and_conferences.name: Local barber expos
events_and_conferences.relevance: high — more accessible for a bootstrapped founder
events_and_conferences.opportunity: Low-cost booth, direct demos, collect signups

highest_priority.why: Reddit commenter suggested this — it's the most effective strategy for this market segment. Barbers trust face-to-face over online ads.
This is where the ICP actually hangs out and asks for recommendations
Barbers live on Instagram — showing the product in action via Reels could drive signups

medium_priority.why: Every barber visits their supply store — co-marketing opportunity
Catch barbers when they're choosing their first software
Barbers know other barbers — word of mouth is #1 in this industry

low_priority_for_now.why: SPA isn't indexable, new domain has no authority, takes 6-12 months. Fix the technical issues first, then invest.
Too expensive for a bootstrapped solo founder competing against incumbents with huge ad budgets

competitor_presence.fresha: Listed on all major directories, strong SEO, marketplace with built-in discovery
competitor_presence.booksy: Listed everywhere, App Store presence, paid ads, barber influencer partnerships
competitor_presence.squire: Strong Instagram presence, barber community events, direct sales team
competitor_presence.glossgenius: Strong Instagram/TikTok, influencer marketing, product-led growth
competitor_presence.square: Everywhere — retail stores, hardware, online, partnerships

key_insight: Timber is currently invisible. Not listed on any software directory. No social media presence. No community engagement outside Reddit (which is the wrong community). The founder needs to get listed on G2/Capterra immediately, start posting on Instagram, and engage in Facebook barber groups. Most importantly: walk into local barbershops with a tablet and demo the product.
